## Protocol.Overlay.ScreenshotRequestedEvent interface

Fired when user asks to capture screenshot of some area on the page.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ScreenshotRequestedEvent 
```

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
